function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Drop in pedestrian traffic associated with commercial activity due to COVID-19","Impact":"Threatens the viability of local stores, coffee shops, and retailers, and changes the character of neighborhoods","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to attract online customers, offer delivery services, and adapt business models to comply with social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, contactless payment systems, and crowd monitoring technologies","People":"Local store owners, employees, and residents","Owner":"Local business associations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Limitations on social behavior and informal social interactions in public spaces due to the pandemic","Impact":"Reduces the ability to develop new relationships, especially among strangers, and hinders the formation of community bonds","Mitigation":"Promote virtual social interactions, create designated outdoor gathering spaces with safety measures, and facilitate community-building activities through online platforms","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, outdoor seating arrangements, and community engagement apps","People":"Residents, visitors, and community organizers","Owner":"Local municipalities and community organizations"},{"Description":"Reconfiguration of street activities in cities reliant on tourism due to COVID-19","Impact":"Changes the look and feel of cities, especially near major attractions, and affects the livelihood of businesses dependent on tourism","Mitigation":"Promote domestic tourism, create attractive local experiences, and support businesses with financial assistance and marketing efforts","Technologies":"Tourism marketing platforms, digital experience platforms, and financial support systems","People":"Tourists, local businesses, and employees in the tourism sector","Owner":"Tourism boards, local governments, and business associations"}]}
